message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?
I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $175.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $120?
I understand that you're still looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $165.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $140?
I'm getting closer to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $155.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $130?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $160, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $160.
I'm really not willing to pay any more than this, Alice. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $120?
